mainPage.description: I am a Web developer. I like to follow and participate in the evolution of projects, from the conception to the deployment.

project0.title: Sunset Radio
project0.description: Sunset Radio is a web-based francophone community radio station. I worked on the development of the website as well as the design of a music bot on a communication platform called Discord.

project1.title: Technological Corner
project1.description: TCorner is a school team project in which I was in charge of developing a static website for presentation purposes.

project2.title: Easy NPS
project2.description: Easy NPS is a tool to make the completion of customer satisfaction surveys easier for retail stores.

quote0.content: “The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.”
quote0.author: — Steve Jobs
